title: Paper Girls: The Complete Story
description: Brian K. Vaughan and Cliff Chiangâ€™s Eisner Award winning series Paper Girls is coming to Amazon Prime Video in July 2022!Finally, the entire Eisner Award-winning epic in one complete volume, with a new cover from co-creator CLIFF CHIANG!Four 12-year-old newspaper delivery girls from the year 1988 uncover the most important story of all time. Suburban drama and otherworldly mysteries collide in this critically acclaimed series about nostalgia, first jobs, and the last days of childhood.Collects PAPER GIRLS #1-30
author: Brian K. Vaughan
